name: mikroe.click.stepper14
short_description: The Stepper 14 Click is a Click board™ that features the DRV8847PWPR, a step motor driver, from Texas Instruments. This Click board™ provides a bipolar step motor controle, It features an H-bridge bipolar step motor driver, which supports full-, half-, quarter-, or eighth-step modes. This click board™ also carries a port expander so that the communication can be done with a minimal number of pins, through the mikroBUS™ I2C bus.
